name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Compact, sleek design with superior sound quality. Long battery life and noise cancellation for immersive listening.

name: Smartwatch
description: Track fitness, heart rate, and notifications. Stay connected with GPS, activity monitoring, and health insights.

name: Eco-Friendly Water Bottle
description: BPA-free, insulated, and reusable for daily hydration. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.

name: Portable Power Bank
description: Fast charging with multiple device compatibility. Slim, lightweight, and ideal for on-the-go power needs.
